title: Don’t Look Back
description: “The first time my mummy killed me, it was an accident.”   - - -My mum is a psychotic bitch and my dad moved us half way across the world to escape her. I’ve suffered unimaginable abuse.. even dad doesn’t know the full extent. But when the annoyingly gorgeous Rafe gives me CPR he witnesses my past in the 10 seconds our lips are connected. Now he knows my real secret.. the secret even dad doesn’t know.. the secret that’s going to kill me..
author: Nadia Harlan
